website_summaries.verdict: If you need a pair of waterproof socks that you can easily use all summer long, this pair lives up to the Ultralite name.
pros: Bamboo lining is soft and breathable
Lightweight ankle-length fit is ideal for warm weather
Can be worn by men and women - those with larger feet should size up for a good fit
cons: Not the best pick for cold weather

customer_reviews.title: Makes great Kuffs!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect socks for making ablution over. Many shaykhs have approved them to be wiped over including Shaykh Mohammed Samer al-Nass, one of the world's most authoritative Hanafi scholars.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza A. Dudgeon

customer_reviews.title: These were by far the best investment I have made for hiking
customer_reviews.text: These were by far the best investment I have made for hiking, etc. I originally purchased these for a trip to Montana in early spring. There was snow and it was cold at times. I was able to put these over my normal hiking socks. They create a great barrier for the wet snow or rain. Mt feet were dry and warm. They also come in handy living in Florida and hiking through the rainy season. Often the trails are wet and these work great. I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: really good product
customer_reviews.text: These worked pretty incredibly. I referee soccer so I need to be outside in wet weather frequently. I tried these for the first time last night. Heavy rain with significant standing water on the field. Any other socks and my feet would have been drenched immediately. My shoes and outer socks were soaked but my actual feet and inner sock were 90% dry. Pretty good for running in water for 90 minutes (this was pretty much as wet as you could possibly get). I'd definitely recommend these. They are also much less bulky than a few other options I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: matt altman

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical...
customer_reviews.text: I put my hand in my sock and held it under the faucet and my hand remained completely dry. Then I wore them playing disc golf in the morning, walking through wet grass, and my feet were able to breathe and stay dry simultaneously. Precisely what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Keller

customer_reviews.title: The only strange thing is that they sound like there is plastic in the middle
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these in very wet places and my feet stayed dry. They are thick, so that gives a bit of extra padding. The only strange thing is that they sound like there is plastic in the middle, which thee may be. But my feet are dry!
customer_reviews.author: Film Music Fan

customer_reviews.title: husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: great socks. Husband loves them for golfing. He needs to remember to use them for other outside activities, like snow shoveling!! He says they are comfy and do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After a half dozen festivals with wet feet, I purchased these bad boys. After over a year of using them, because I forgot to review them, I can say that I am more than satisfied. All shoes are waterproof shoes when you wear these! I tell everyone about them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L. Stull

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel like plastic, keeps you dry and warm
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worried that these would feel like wearing plastic socks. They are a little stiff, but not uncomfortably so. They definitely do a good job keeping your feet warm and dry from outside puddles/etc. - wore them with sneakers while hiking in damp places and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P.

customer_reviews.title: Staying dry in the rainforest.
customer_reviews.text: Took these on a half day ATV ride in the rainforest, during rainy season. They performed very well, and even after going through several streams, only the outside layer was wet.
customer_reviews.author: Parzival

customer_reviews.title: Wore on the Appalachian Trail, held up to rain ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore on the Appalachian Trail, held up to rain but not puddles or severe wet conditions. I wore them with a trail runner which is very subject to soaking so they might work well with a combination gore tex boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have socks for Muslims
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof socks have occasional uses for many, but for practicing muslims this is a must have! These are a great, and from my research an approved, alternative to the traditional khuffain. I have used it for a week now. These are thin enough to fit comfortably into work shoes. Makes doing wudu (ablution) before prayers much easier, faster, and less to clean up after. And yes, the socks are indeed waterproof, breathable, and allow your feet to move. I wear medium socks - the mediums fit, but I have a feeling that the large may have been a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome socks
customer_reviews.text: The best brand of socks ever. I wear these when I run in the ran or go to the mountains and play. My feet say dry and warm. I love these socks. Got a pair for the whole family. Kids happen to love dry feet when they play in the snow. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These look great. Feel great too, Have not tried to get them wet yet. Bought them to wear on the beach in norther California. They keep your feet warm!
customer_reviews.author: Karhlie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome waterproof socks!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome waterproof socks! I like that the are made a bamboo and made with sturdy quality. They feel comfortable on and do not slip down my ankle, but are not overly constricting. The stripes are fun and can't wait to wear them in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: In love with this socks!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this socks. I used it forong distance pedal and is very confortable. Keeps your feet warm in the cold morning and freshed during sunny days... i do recommend it and going to buy more for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Luciana

customer_reviews.title: These socks are great and they really keep your feet dry which is ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great and they really keep your feet dry which is wonderful because my waterproof shoes turned out to be not that waterproof. My feet were always wet and cold after working outside in the elements until I found these socks. They are a lifesaver for me during the cold wet winter days.
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable socks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Kept my feet dry in a light but continuous rain, while bicycling. Wore these socks for 3 consecutive days and my feet stayed dry!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Size very small
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium size but it is way small.I even could not wear it.Tried to solve with seller OutdoorSportPro but they referred me Amazon Customer Service instead of solving my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I used these socks in the Scottish wind and rain. I used a silk liner and the socks inside my Merrell Moab 2 shoes. Normally, I wear thick cotton crew socks. These Ultralite socks fit perfectly and did not seem tight. Now that I am back from the trip I have to hide them from the normal laundry. The instructions say to be careful and gently wash the socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I had these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Alaska and they were perfect for hiking in the rain! Hand washed and air dried and wore the next day too. Surprisingly comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley K

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I wore these on a 40 minute bike ride to work in a light rain, going through some places with standing water, and my feet were pretty wet by time I got to work.. The socks took a full day to dry out. They are cute though
customer_reviews.author: MT Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I work at a waterpark over the summer and my job involves a decent amount of power washing, so i needed some waterproof socks that were also breathable enough to be worn over the summer. These socks did exactly that! They fit perfectly and I can walk through puddles without getting my feet uncomfortably drenched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Thinker than I thought. I can only wear them with one pair of boots. I put part of it under the faucet to see how impermeable they are and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Be very particular how you clean / wash or they may get ruined! Hand wash only
customer_reviews.text: Smooth & light weight, nice stretch yet snug fit. And look cool too! Time will tell how durable these are and how they respond to washing. Obviously expensive but definitely worth it if they’re wudu compatible and and if they last!
customer_reviews.author: Happiness Through Islam - Submission

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Runs on the smaller side, so I suggest you get a size up from your normal size. But it works great!! The socks are waterproof. I was amazed that they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good first impression
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable and the fit is very good. I haven't had a chance to submerge them yet but I did pour some water on them and the water ran off completely and my feet stayed dry. I bought them to keep my feet dry and warm while white water rafting and I think these will be exactly what I need. I'm anxious to give them a true test.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great socks. So happy I bought them for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. So happy I bought them for a rainy/windy golf tournament. I wore a very light pair of socks underneath them as they are not exactly comfortable on the skin. but they really keep your feet warm that way.
customer_reviews.author: Lexxieone

customer_reviews.title: Size runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Overall the quality of the socks seems okay but note the sizing runs really small. There are better waterproof socks on the market that are true to size and better priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To stop sagging the elasticity and quality must be improved ...
customer_reviews.text: To stop sagging the elasticity and quality must be improved. The socks are quite expensive and expected to last longer when you are using in regular/normal environment
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: these socks are not only cute but they are definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: these socks are not only cute but they are definitely waterproof. I wore them on a rainy day in Alaska and they kept my feet warm and dry even though my shoes got wet.
customer_reviews.author: glf

customer_reviews.title: Not dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs for the winter months as a mail carrier we work every day no matter the weather. I have worn these twice with a pair of neos overshoes over my shoes and they are wet after my route. Not has bad as when I wear wool socks but for the price it is disappointing as I have only worn them in snow. Will not buy again and had them too long to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do their job
customer_reviews.text: Tested them in pools of water and they did the job. Not just while standing still but they actually kept me dry for over an hour while walking in mud and puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, these socks are not waterproof. I took them on a canoe trip to keep my feet warm, while wearing sandals to get in and out of the canoe. They are absolutely not waterproof. When I took them off, water actually came out of them as they HELD water rather than wicked it away. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary S Olson

customer_reviews.title: These socks were ordered long distance from the UK on ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks were ordered long distance from the UK on Amazon USA to be delivered to my son in Seattle as he reached port for a short stopover on The Clipper round the world yacht race. The window of opportunity for delivery was tight but everything went to plan and he is now wearing them! Hopefully these will help keep his feet warm and dry on the next leg to Panama. The pink stripe was to match his Liverpool team boat.
customer_reviews.author: S J STAFFORD

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who is a mailman for those rainy days where his feet were always getting wet. He loves these socks, and stated that they keep his feet dry during his 12 miles he walks on his route delivering the mail. Great socks!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: also makes my shoes super tight unless I let out a lot of space ...
customer_reviews.text: socks are a snug fit and I can't get a moisture wicking sock on first, also makes my shoes super tight unless I let out a lot of space on the straps. The GOOD thing is, totally water proof, rode 15 miles through 3-4" of sloppy slush, shoes were soaked, feet were a little cold but totally dry.
customer_reviews.author: eric m

customer_reviews.title: The quality of product was really nice and had no trouble returning it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered large and end up returning it due to size being a bit small for me. The quality of product was really nice and had no trouble returning it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shah

customer_reviews.title: OK for ultralight socks.
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable and helped reduce blisters. As they are ultralight, just know that they aren't really waterproof on long hikes.
customer_reviews.author: stickles86

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof! fits not as form fitting as a true sock but kept my feet dry when I needed it
customer_reviews.author: SpokeyDokey00

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. My fiance and I used them to keep us dry as we climbed Mt. Fuji. Very reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Chris del ValleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Would be awesome, if you can make your products machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mazher Abdul Qayyum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Warm snug but not too much! Nice product. good for emergency kits if you think about it.
customer_reviews.author: wakajawaka

customer_reviews.title: Hubby is very happy with these socks
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is very happy with these socks! He works outside in water, and they keep his feet completely dry for 8+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool socks. Ran them under water while wearing them and my feet stayed dry. Very comfortable also.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet dry
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was whining initially that they were to thick to wear when running cross country, but has gotten use to them and her feet staying dry in some nasty conditions
customer_reviews.author: BIG DOG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got in the water at the Jordan river, in the winter, and my feet stayed warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Michelle S White

customer_reviews.title: no false expectations
customer_reviews.text: The color is exactly what you see at the photo, they are a little bit thick but I guess they all are similar.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Tabin

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: It makes my foots smell terrible! One star enough !
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well!
customer_reviews.text: Item came as described and does a great job of keeping my feet dry when hiking and having to walk through a creek
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof and keeps my feet warm in winter specially with snow , slush .
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: I don't mind these socks for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Best socks around! Does what it says. Keeps feet dry and warm. Very thick, kind of like a wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: Infamous K

customer_reviews.title: These socks are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Went Moonlight snowshoeing and stayed dry in a pair of tennis shoes. These socks are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K Warren

customer_reviews.title: Yep, They Are Waterproof, But Comfortable to Wear
customer_reviews.text: These socks are GREAT in the rain! I wear them while cycling and they work well. They are not bulky like so many other waterproof socks and feel like a normal pair of socks. They were easy to wear with cycling shoes. They WORK! When washing I recommend turning them inside out because the outside is waterproof! I always hang them to dry and they do take a bit of time to dry - TURN THEM INSIDE OUT WHEN WASHING AND DRYING. While on a recent cycling trip I also just wore them to keep my feet a bit warmer and found them to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. It keeps my feet dry when raining.
customer_reviews.author: Ryne

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! I wore it on the golf course ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I wore it on the golf course and it was really rainy that day. I didn't feel a thing even though my golf shoes weren't exactly waterproof.....
customer_reviews.author: I-CHING C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great socks kept my feet warm and dry and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: brandon wood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked well. Keeps my feet dry while walking on wet surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kolagotla

customer_reviews.title: Singing in the rain.....
customer_reviews.text: True to size... And of course we made my sister walk on water.... She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Silence Dogood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light and truely waterproof. Not like neoprene compressions socks
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these socks to use when he goes golfing and it's wet outside. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Wore these over Smartwool socks under a dry suit for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore these over Smartwool socks under a dry suit for a winter rafting trip and my feet were always warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet warm during a day of skiing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm during a day of skiing. Fits a a little looser than you would expect a sock, but does not slip off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Won

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a golfing trip to the wet Pacific N.W.
customer_reviews.author: Luke A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Dexshell socks are completely waterproof, if, you wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Dexshell socks are completely waterproof, if, you wear proper water proof pants. Nothing will save our feet without water proof pants when it's raining cats and dogs. For colder weather, i will switch to the calf length merino wool version dexshell waterproof socks to add warmth.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks work relatively well; it seems like they do let in minisicul amounts of water after they've been wore a few times. These socks will work best for when it rains, they're not really meant to be submerged in water for extended periods of time, although, they probably could withstand the water from coming in.
customer_reviews.author: Justin hebert

customer_reviews.title: Good socks for wudu for Muslims
customer_reviews.text: Good for Muslims in winter because you don't have to wash your feet when making wudu (ablution). I always use them during cold weather and they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zafarjon Bozorov

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: These are better than expected. I wear non-waterproof boots for hiking (if they do keep your feet dry in the wet, which is problematic, they take forever to dry). I wanted a pair of socks that I could use with my boots when in the rain. These worked very well; fit well and kept my feet dry. And, importantly, they were thinner than other waterproof socks I have looked out so they weren't too bulky compared to my usual non-waterproof socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Advice: Order one size above
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to previous comments I ordered Large when I usually order Medium and it fits fine. I do not know how it performs in rainy situation yet. I'll update as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: I like my feet to be dry
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Just nope! I like my feet to be dry.. especially when a product promises such things! I wanted to love it.. but NOPE!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Dry feet, great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these. He works outdoors, 6 days/week, regardless of the weather. He said they keep his feet completely dry, all of the time. Will definitely will come back for more. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbz

customer_reviews.title: I have a bunch from different manufacturers and they are all like that. I guess it's the nature of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof socks are always kinda loose. I have a bunch from different manufacturers and they are all like that. I guess it's the nature of the beast so to speak. If you find one that fits like a real sock, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Strange feeling socks, tight but loose similar to wetsuit material or aqua sox..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks so far
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks so far! Haven't tried out the water resistance yet though. I hate wearing socks and these are very breathable! I caught myself going to bed with them still on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: bluelala

customer_reviews.title: Not completely form fitting but good enough not to be saggy
customer_reviews.text: Softer than most waterproof socks. Not completely form fitting but good enough not to be saggy.
customer_reviews.author: MHD

customer_reviews.title: Great socks! In an effort to save time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! In an effort to save time and space, I decided not to pack hiking boots for my trip to Guatemala this summer and use these socks with water ready shoes. I specifically needed them for a hike up a volcano and they were perfect! Lightweight, breathable and well made. Added bonus, I didn't have to empty out my socks every break because they were very snug- they kept the volcanic soil out of my shoes. Highly recommend! (I wear I size 10 women's and the medium size fit perfectly.)
customer_reviews.author: kacbelle

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my boyfriend, he works with water and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend, he works with water and always got chafing/blisters from using his soaked socks all day. No more pain for him now, he loves them! Helps keep his feet warm when its a little cold too
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these out yet, but tried them on. They are thin neoprene. At first I thought they'd never fit in my shoes but they do and I can tell they will be warm and cozy. I'm going to Ireland on a bike tour and my shoes are very light weight with a mesh top so I'll sure I'll be loving these.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They keep my girlfriend's feet dry in most conditions other than swimming.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Size up for small ankles/legs
customer_reviews.text: Fits large but I have skinny ankles. They keep your feet dry as long as water doesn't come in from the top.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Spence

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! Got them because my husband mountain bikes. These are comfor and definitely waterproof. Ran them under the water in the bathtub and feet stayed dry! Just bought a pair for my father in law in Puerto Rico. Would totally recommend to other athletes or hikers. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KSierra

customer_reviews.title: Dry feet
customer_reviews.text: Keep my feet dry. Wear the socks inside my fishing waters. Not only are my feet dry, the socks offer an extra layer comfort. Will definately purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Kay s

customer_reviews.title: Live in Florida as a outdoor guide and work 14+ ...
customer_reviews.text: Live in Florida as a outdoor guide and work 14+ he says sometimes and feet don't sweat or become waterlogged. Not sure the washing process but I turn inside out just in case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep em dry even on summer days!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of goretex dry socks over 15 years ago. Working on my feet all day its vital to keep them dry. I researched them and for $22 a pair i found them to be an awesome deal! Upon arrival i tested them right away! They feel awesome and they breathe far better than regular cotton sock which was surprising. Altho they are long enough for a basketball sneaker i woukdnt recommend them for taller boots or shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bootsrapper

customer_reviews.title: sweaty feet
customer_reviews.text: tried these for work in a mess hall for seafood processors. Long hours on his feet, wearing crocs. He says his feet sweat even more than before.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, as it was described. Highly recommended for Muslim community for making Masah for Wudu.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeMAN

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it works fine as waterproof socks but it was buggy around my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it works fine as waterproof socks but it was buggy around my ankle. Since I'll be crossing deep stream, this will not keep water out of my shoes and defeat the purpose. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: HonestConsumer

customer_reviews.title: They did ok at first, but did not quite ...
customer_reviews.text: They did ok at first, but did not quite stand the test of my summer de-tasseling season. Would look for a different brand for heavy-labor style waterproofing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Great sock for swim officials.
customer_reviews.text: I am a USA swimming official and this sock is great for working around the pool. Wish it came in white so It could be worn in summer on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: DRTLNG

customer_reviews.title: works great, just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about these but put them on and walked around bathtub with them on and TOTALLY DRY its the strangest thing. You expect them to soak up the water with how soft they are but nope bone dry. These worked so well on our last motorcycle trip we bought a couple pairs :-)
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: As Described.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Product appears to be of quality value when compared to similar products available. Would purchase again when I run through these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McMahon

product_meta.title: DexShell Ultralite Bamboo Waterproof Socks
product_meta.description:
DexShell Ultralite Bamboo Running Socks are lightweight, ankle length socks made with bamboo rayon inner. 
The top of the socks incorporate an in-cuff seal to help prevent water ingress, making these socks excellent for any outdoor activities where there is a need to keep completely waterproof.

Features include:

Outer: 96% Nylon, 3% Elastane, 1% Cuff Elastics
Interlining: 100% Waterproof and Windproof Porelle(R) Membrane
Inner: 70% Bamboo rayon (viscose), 30% Nylon
Ankle length with in-cuff seal
Seamless construction for the highest comfort

DexShell's element repellent socks are perfect for all outdoor activities, in all weather conditions. 
These waterproof, yet breathable socks offer comfort as well as protection, whether you're walking, cycling, or even participating in watersports. 
The high-tech materials that make up these socks ensure that they're not only thermal, windproof, and waterproof, but also durable and lightweight.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
WATERPROOF: functional interlining Porelle membrane make DexShell 100% waterproof
SOFT BAMBOO LINING: Outer: 96% Nylon, 3% Elastane, 1% Cuff Elastics / Inner: 70% Bamboo rayon, 30% Nylon
COMFORTABLE: ankle length, ultra-light weight, seamless construction with casual design
BREATHABLE: Porelle membrane make it highly breathable
VERSATILE: ideal for any outdoor activity
